mapper.select: SELECT C.ID , C.BID , EMPID , E.FIRST_NAME || ' ' || E.LAST_NAME AS empName , C.CONTENT, C.CREATEDATE , C.DELETED , C.HIDDEN , C.LIKECNT FROM COMMENTS C JOIN EMPLOYEES E ON C.EMPID = E.EMPLOYEE_ID WHERE C.ID = #{id}

SELECT C.ID , C.BID , EMPID , E.FIRST_NAME || ' ' || E.LAST_NAME AS empName , C.CONTENT, C.CREATEDATE , C.DELETED , C.HIDDEN , C.LIKECNT FROM COMMENTS C JOIN EMPLOYEES E ON C.EMPID = E.EMPLOYEE_ID WHERE C.BID = #{bid}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO COMMENTS(ID, BID, EMPID, CONTENT, HIDDEN, DELETED) VALUES(COMMENTS_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{bId}, #{empId}, #{content}, 'N', 'N')
